General.Name: Zhejiang Double Arrow Rubber Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Double Arrow Rubber Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells rubber conveyor belt products in China and internationally. It provides fabric conveyor belts comprising aramid, straight wrap, fabric pipe, anti-tear fabric, anti-adhesion, profiled, and heat-resistant conveyor belts; and high temperature, flame, oil, cold, and acid-alkaline resistant fabric and steel cord conveyor belts. The company also offers solid woven conveyor belts; and low rolling resistance, pipe, and intelligent anti-tear steel cord conveyor belts, as well as IW/SW steel mesh conveyor belts. Its products are mainly used in coal, electric power, ports, steel, cement, import, metallurgy, mining, building materials, and other industries. The company was formerly known as TongXiang Duble Arrow Group CO., Ltd. and changed its name to Zhejiang Double Arrow Rubber Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1986 and is based in Tongxiang, China.
